articles.title: News that one man survived the Air India plane crash weighs on some other sole survivors - AP News
articles.description: News of the sole survivor of an Air India plane crash that killed the other 241 people aboard has led to endless fascination online. But it's also stirred up painful feelings for a handful of people who have had similar fates. Tens of thousands of people have…
